   Promote a body-positive mindset by emphasizing self-acceptance and challenging unrealistic beauty standards. Encourage friends to focus on their strengths and self-worth beyond physical appearance.

By approaching discussions about appearance with thoughtfulness, empathy, and respect, you can foster positive and meaningful conversations with your friends.
